title: Sauteed Mushrooms
directions: Prep Time: Minutes ━ Difficulty: Easy ━ Servings: 4 Servings
Clean mushrooms and slice thinly with a knife or mandolin then set aside.
Melt butter in WOK or stainless steel frying pan. Slowly add the wine.
Salt and pepper mushrooms. Sprinkle minced garlic over all.
Saute; stirring occasionally over medium high heat until mushrooms are tender and the sauce and wine are reduced, approximately 15 - 20 minutes.
ingredients: 2 lbs white button mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 (187 ml) bottle Chardonnay wine (mini bottle from 4 pack)
